Doing some Monday morning #gamedev and thinking about how to compensate for first-player advantage. And right now I'm debating 3 options.

1. bidding for turn order
2. setup order/modifiers
3. simultaneous turns

I like simultaneous turns but it bakes in some mechanical lopsidedness, so bidding? 🎲✂
